mapper.sql: mwv.id as id, mwv.winery_id as winery_id, mwv.winery_voucher_inst_id as winery_voucher_inst_id, mwv.mbr_id as mbr_id, mwv.name as name, mwv.type as type, mwv.voucher_amt as voucher_amt, mwv.voucher_discount as voucher_discount, mwv.prod_sku_id as prod_sku_id, mwv.enable_type as enable_type, mwv.enable_amt as enable_amt, mwv.quantity_limit_cnt as quantity_limit_cnt, mwv.effective_begin_date as effective_begin_date, mwv.effective_end_date as effective_end_date, mwv.use_scope as use_scope, mwv.voucher_cnt as voucher_cnt, mwv.create_date as create_date, mwv.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_winery_voucher (id, winery_id, winery_voucher_inst_id, mbr_id, name, type, voucher_amt, voucher_discount, prod_sku_id, enable_type, enable_amt, quantity_limit_cnt, effective_begin_date, effective_end_date, use_scope, voucher_cnt, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineryId}, #{wineryVoucherInstId}, #{mbrId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{voucherAmt}, #{voucherDiscount}, #{prodSkuId}, #{enableType}, #{enableAmt}, #{quantityLimitCnt}, #{effectiveBeginDate}, #{effectiveEndDate}, #{useScope}, #{voucherCnt}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_winery_voucher
winery_id = #{wineryId},
winery_voucher_inst_id = #{wineryVoucherInstId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
voucher_amt = #{voucherAmt},
voucher_discount = #{voucherDiscount},
prod_sku_id = #{prodSkuId},
enable_type = #{enableType},
enable_amt = #{enableAmt},
quantity_limit_cnt = #{quantityLimitCnt},
effective_begin_date = #{effectiveBeginDate},
effective_end_date = #{effectiveEndDate},
use_scope = #{useScope},
voucher_cnt = #{voucherCnt},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
